column5: Magnificent estate located in the highly custom section of Austin Hill Country. Enjoy front views of Lake Austin, backs onto the Balcones Canyonland Preserve and is a 2 minute walk from Austin's best hiking trail, soccer fields, tennis courts. 5 incredibly spacious bedrooms, 6100 sq ft of room to relax in comfort. Magnificent outdoor entertaining/TV/pool/ Hot tub area. Full house audio/intercom system that can run off iPod media. Gated garage entry.
column8: Magnificent Estate Across from Lake Austin
